TopicTitle: How and van I revert back my ship saves?

Articles.Content: Is it possible to revert back saves? My little brother accidentally deleted one of my best creations. I still have some of those in orbit but the save file was overridden. Is it possible to get them back somehow without rebuilding them?
Unless you have undelete software you may be out of luck, sorry.
Only stock option is to reload a quicksave. If you don't have a quicksave where that particular craft is still in orbit you're out of luck.
